37.eng-name: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) forbade Qaza. I said to Nafi:What is Qaza'? He said: This means having a part of a boy's head shaved and leaving a part unshaven

chapter.eng-name: It Is Disliked To Shave Part Of The Head And Leave Part
